attributes.action: Declare the possession of a car to be illegal by 2015.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cars kill over 3000 people annually in the UK & 100,000s worlwide.
Cars maim over 20,000 annually in the UK.
They pollute the environment leading to 1 in 7 children suffering from asthma.
Road building has destroyed our countryside, our towns & villages.
Out of town shopping - possible due to the car - has destroyed our communities
The car greatly contributes to climate change.
